content: a dear friend of mine asked me to create a simple long sleeved cardigan for her to knit and so this was designed for you estelle the cardigan is a top-down raglan sleeve garment the collar is cast on and starts immediately next increases are worked to shape the front back and sleeves the sleeves stitches are then placed on stitch holders and the front and back are joined and worked straight including the hem the sleeve stitches are then picked up and worked in the round the button band is worked as you go it is a quick and simple design that looks good in any colour i hope you enjoy making this cardigan to keep a little one in your life warm and snuggly **materials ** ~ any standard dk weight yarn medium preemie approx 120m and large preemie approx 150m ~ 4 0mm knitting needles ~ stitch markers ~ 4/5 buttons ~ darning needle **difficulty beginner** **skills used ** ~ knit & purl ~ increases & decreases ~ selvedge edge ~ knitting in the round sleeves only sizes ~ 32cm chest circumference - approx 3-4lbs - medium preemie ~ 36cm chest circumference - approx 5-6lbs - large preemie for a short sleeved version please check out the preemie sweetpea cardigan 1 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/preemie-sweetpea-cardigan
